title: Track Buyer's Loan Application Progress
description: Early in a transaction, the TC needs to ensure the buyer has formally applied for their loan.

tasks.description: Review the contract for the loan application deadline.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the contract requires the buyer to apply for a loan within 5 days of acceptance.

tasks.description: Contact the buyer's loan officer to confirm the application has been submitted.
tasks.expected_outcome: The loan officer confirms via email that the application is complete.

tasks.description: Mark the 'Loan Application' task as complete in the transaction management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The checklist item is updated, showing the buyer has met their contractual obligation.
